title: no chest

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
hi riot! i get s+ with jinx but why i didn't get a chest?
 although i have chest available and this is first s with jinx this season!

replies.body: It looks like you already earned a chest with Jinx on the 14th.  Per the [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide, mastery chests are only available once per champion per season.  Let me know if that clears things up!

Why would Riot create a system that punishes people that like to focus on playing fewer champs. That doesn't even make sense...I have four champs that I play regularly, and obviously I've already gotten my chests on them. So I've been spending the last few days playing ARAMs to try and get some chests because I have a ton of keys. I don't get it

and what if you or someone gets an s on your team, and you haven't earned a chest with a champ yet, but still don't get the chest? then what happens? for instance, i got an s+ with Ashe, but didn't earn the chest. And i have played with champs that i KNOW I haven't earned a chest for, yet when a team member did get that rank, i still didn't get the chest. so... what gives?
But the s in 14th was in seasom 6 aren't we in season 7 now?
Off topic: apparently when you click on the cookie policy "I Agree" button, the match history page assumes that the click was part of the match history page links.
You likely were playing Jinx with a premade team wherein someone else on your team got an S, netting you a chest for playing Jinx.
